function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of mobile apps for tracking COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy, data security concerns, and reliance on technology for public health surveillance","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy regulations, encryption of data, and regular security audits","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage, and anonymization techniques","People":"General public, individuals being tracked, and public health authorities","Owner":"Government regulatory bodies, public health organizations, and technology companies"}]}
